author: Ray睿
content:
https://suta.io/en
Suta is more of a demo page.
I want to inject some fresh ideas into the current AI startup scene and see if it brings a different vibe.
Because of this, its output and performance might be a bit unstable.

author: Ray睿
content:
After a week of hard work, I’m excited to invite you to try this platform.
Just upload your code, grab a coffee, and in five minutes, it will break down the flow and steps, making it easier to understand.
The link is in the pinned comment.

#startup #ai

author: Ray睿
content:
最近快速玩了一下 GPT4 跟 Gemini Advanced
來分享一下使用心得～
這是得出了結論 (滿分10分) 
　　　　　　　GPT4　 Gemini Advanced 
回答速度　　　2分　　9分
程式碼精確度　8分　　8分
中文造詣能力　9分　　2分
繪圖能力　　　8分　　7分
綜合評分　　　7分　　7分
#AI #Gemini #ChatGPT
